description: GNOSYS MCP Router - Manage and execute MCP server actions

discover_server_actions.description: **PREFERRED STARTING POINT**: Discover available actions from servers based on user query.
discover_server_actions.signature: discover_server_actions(user_query: str, server_names: List[str] = None) -> Dict[str, Any]

execute_action.description: Execute a specific action with the provided parameters.
execute_action.signature: execute_action(server_name: str, action_name: str, path_params: Optional[str] = None, query_params: Optional[str] = None, body_schema: Optional[str] = '{}') -> Dict[str, Any]

get_action_details.description: Get detailed information about a specific action.
get_action_details.signature: get_action_details(server_name: str, action_name: str) -> Dict[str, Any]

handle_auth_failure.description: Handle authentication failures that occur when executing actions.
handle_auth_failure.signature: handle_auth_failure(server_name: str, intention: str, auth_data: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None) -> Dict[str, Any]

manage_servers.description: Manage MCP server connections and Sets.
manage_servers.signature: manage_servers(list_configured_mcps: bool = False, list_sets: bool = False, connect: Optional[str] = None, connect_set: Optional[str] = None, connect_set_exclusive: bool = False, search_sets: Optional[str] = None, upsert_set: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, delete_set: Optional[str] = None, disconnect: Optional[str] = None, disconnect_set: Optional[str] = None, disconnect_all: bool = False, populate_catalog: bool = False) -> str

search_documentation.description: Search for server action documentations by keyword matching.
search_documentation.signature: search_documentation(query: str, server_name: str, max_results: int = 10) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]

search_mcp_catalog.description: Search for tools in the offline catalog and discover Sets/Collections.
search_mcp_catalog.signature: search_mcp_catalog(query: str, max_results: int = 20) -> Dict[str, Any]

gnosys.description: GNOSYS MCP Router - Manage and execute MCP server actions
